glossdef.para: The main entity and interfaces of GVS to which graphs are added and retrieved

A named source of a changing graph
A component of a lossless decomposition of a graph (i.e. a Molecule or an FgNode.
A subgraph containing recurvely for all non-grounded nodes its relative

A node which is grounded by function and/or inverse functional properties. In the molecule terminology of Ding et All.: a set of Non-terminal molecules grounding the same node. In java it is representeded by a subinterface of GroundedNode and thus trherated the same way as NamedNodes and Literals in most areas.
